InformativeText.Abstract: The Object Last-Modified characteristic exposes a value representing a date and time when the object content was last modified. The date and time value shall be represented in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

Note.p: The fields in the above table, reading from top to bottom, are shown in the order of LSO to MSO, where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet. Data Type: Same format as the Date Time characteristic
